trends: There have been no other sightings in Bayview
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Huge Triangle, 3 white lights and one amber. low, slow coasted right over me noisless
divs: sighting detailsthis happened many years ago while i am uncertain of the exact date or time i was about 6 years old and we lived in bayview tx. the housing complex we lived at was used by federal employees as my father was with the border patrol and worked at the immigration base just down the road. 26.150245,-97.35035 will put you exactly where i was standing at the time. we moved out of the base in 74 so this had to have happened sometime in the fall or early winter in 73 as i wasn't allowed out very late being i was only about 6 but it was after dusk and was dark - there were many stars out and i was going to a friends just a few houses over when i had that feeling you get that stands all the hair on your neck and arms up and i froze and spun around and there it was. a huge triangle as big as a football field floating straight toward me from the west, it was over the open field across the street and moving very slow like it was just floating totally silent. i was transfixed and scared to run inside to get someone because i was amazed and afraid to look away so i stood there and watched it float straight at and over me and once i was looking straight up at it i spun around on the spot and watched it until it went out of site straight toward the bay and gulf. the whole time couldn't have been more than about 10 minutes or so but seemed much longer. this thing was also very low only a few hundred feet up if even that high. i could not make out any markings or distinct features from the underside other than to say it appeared matte black, no reflections from street lamps or anything of the sort, the only way i know it was solid was that it blotted out a good portion of the stars. this thing had 3 bright white lights on each tip and one yellow\amber\orange light that was not dead center but between the center and the back 2 lights kind of if it were a chevron. the night was clear and all the stars were out and it blotted them from the sky so i know it was actually a triangle shape but the amber light was not centered but toward the rear halfway from center to the back. the amber light was the one that was so strange as it was constantly shifting like looking at a mirage or heat from the road ahead, just shifted with all 3 colors never really yellow orange or amber but all and none at the same time just constantly shifting. i have never seen another one again but after talking to my sister she tells me that all the kids(older) used to lay out in the open field in the block and watch them, she tells me she never saw one down low but always up fairly high and that they would just disappear and she never could point it out to someone else because they were gone to fast.
